definitions.definition: (derogatory, Christianity) An infidel (in reference to the doubting Apostle).
An Apostle, best remembered for doubting the resurrection of Jesus.
A male given name from Aramaic of biblical origin, popular since the 13th century.
A common patronymic surname, from given namesâ€‹.
A number of places in the United States:
definitions.example: An unincorporated  community in Bureau County, Illinois.
